text: Over the weekend, I got a telephone call (yes, a voice call) from one of two people I know whose self-assigned user name is "user error." He is by far the most profoundly tech-hating person I know. He wanted to know how to get started with #ChatGPT.
user_description: Prof Advanced Media, Newhouse School, SYR | CEO The Palmer Group | co-founder https://t.co/1KuXhU9AiR | Host @techstream | #blockchain #web3 #nft #crypto #metaverse
html:
Over the weekend, I got a telephone call (yes, a voice call) from one of two people I know whose self-assigned user name is "user error." He is by far the most profoundly tech-hating person I know. He wanted to know how to get started with #ChatGPT.

— Shelly Palmer (@shellypalmer) February 22, 2023
